title: How to unsubscribe from Badoo
description: Badoo is a dating-focused social network app. To cancel your Badoo subscription, follow these steps depending on how you subscribed.

steps_1.title: Unsubscribe via Badoo Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Badoo subscription via the website:

*   Open the Badoo website.
*   Go to your profile.
*   Navigate to the settings menu.
*   Find the 'Payment settings' or 'Plans' section.
*   Select 'Cancel Subscription'.
*   Confirm your cancellation.
*   Check for a confirmation email to ensure the cancellation was processed.

steps_2.title: Unsubscribe via Badoo App
steps_2.description:
To cancel your Badoo subscription via the app:

*   Open the Badoo app.
*   Go to your profile.
*   Navigate to the settings menu.
*   Find the 'Payment settings' or 'Plans' section.
*   Select 'Cancel Subscription'.
*   Confirm your cancellation.
*   Check for a confirmation email to ensure the cancellation was processed.

seo_text: Cancel your Badoo subscription quickly and easily. Follow our step-by-step guide to unsubscribe from Badoo and manage your dating app subscriptions effectively. Learn how to stop recurring payments and avoid unwanted charges.
